Instruction: Mix together milk, eggs, flour, sugar, and vanilla extract in a large mixing bowl until the batter is smooth and free of lumps.
Cook the pancakes in a greased skillet over medium heat until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and brown on the other side.
Roll each pancake into a spiral. Keep rolling until you have a log-shaped pancake. Repeat with the remaining pancake batter, greasing the skillet as you go.
